header.locationDescription: This location does not offer mail forwarding

overview.heading: Midland Virtual Office
overview.body: Thinking about securing a prestigious Midland address to launch your startup or elevate your existing business, but concerned about the financial obligations of a physical office? Opus VO offers the perfect solution. Establish your brand in one of our prime Midland locations and enjoy the prestige of a respected address without the financial burden. For those times when you need a premium setting for critical meetings or meaningful client interactions, our state-of-the-art conference rooms are at your disposal.  But the advantages don’t stop with a distinguished address. With a virtual office package from Opus VO in Midland, you also gain the services of a live receptionist. Count on us to skillfully manage your client interactions, ensuring they align with your specific business objectives. As for day-to-day administrative tasks like digital mail management and proficient call routing, consider it taken care of, allowing you to focus on growing your venture.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Midland, Texas even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Midland. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Texas.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Midland virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Midland? Why Opus VO?
sections.body: Midland isn’t just an oil and gas hub; it’s also a dynamic business center with abundant opportunities in various sectors. By aligning your virtual office with Opus VO in Midland, you’re tapping into a thriving professional community filled with prospects for collaboration and growth.  Opting for Opus VO in Midland isn’t just about cost-saving; it’s a strategic move designed to propel your business forward. Your next significant milestone could be just one virtual office decision away.  Choose from two Opus VO locations in Midland @ 705 W Wadley Avenue, Midland, TX 79705, or 4416 Briarwood Avenue, Midland, TX 79707
